manpage.author: Brian Langenberger
manpage.name: renames files based on metadata
manpage.title: Audio File Renamer
manpage.description: trackrename takes a list of audio files and renames them based on external or internal metadata.

options.option: show a list of options and exit
The level of output to display. Choose between 'normal', 'quiet' and 'debug.

A MusicBrainz XML file or FreeDB XMCD file to use for track renaming metadata. If no file is given, metadata will be taken from the source tracks, if present. XML and XMCD files can be obtained from the track2xmcd(1), cd2xmcd(1), dvda2xmcd(1), and editxmcd(1) programs.

The format string to use for new filenames. Template fields are replaced with metadata values when new tracks are created. All other text is left as-is. If this option is omitted, a default format string is used.
